Transaction.desc: 请求缴费
不需要手工录入
确认缴费

DynSentence.name: UpdTxnBok
DynSentence.Sentence: update pnttxnbok set BilSts='B',RActNo='%s',TckNo='%s',LogNo='%s',PayDat='%s' where BankCd='%s' and TVchId='%s' and TCrpCd='%s' and BilSts='S'

Transaction.desc: 冲正缴费

DynSentence.name: UpdTxnBokC
DynSentence.Sentence: update pnttxnbok set BilSts='C' where BankCd='%s' and TVchId='%s' and TCrpCd='%s' and TBilTp='%s' and TBilNo='%s'

Transaction.desc: 冲正确认

DynSentence.name: UpdTxnBok
DynSentence.Sentence: update pnttxnbok set BilSts='D' where BankCd='%s' and TVchId='%s' and TCrpCd='%s' and BilSts='C'

Transaction.desc: 银行系统产生的POS收款信息文件
非税系统产生的收款问题账务信息文件
非税系统产生的财政专户分成信息文件
非税系统产生的国库分成信息文件
银行系统产生的财政专户达账信息文件

DynSentence.name: GetCnt
DynSentence.Sentence: select count(*) as TotCnt from pntfccz where TxnDat='%s' and DtlSts='2'

DynSentence.name: GetTit
DynSentence.Sentence: select CityCd,ActNo,ActNam,ActBnk,sum(cast(dtlamt as bigint)) as TitAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TitNum from pntfccz where TxnDat='%s' and DtlSts='2' group by CityCd,ActNo,ActNam,ActBnk

DynSentence.name: GetTot
DynSentence.Sentence: select BankCd,RcvAct,sum(cast(dtlamt as bigint)) as TotAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TotNum from Pntfccz where TxnDat='%s' and DtlSts='2' group by BankCd,RcvAct

DynSentence.name: GetDat
DynSentence.Sentence: select TCrpCd,TCrpNm,PrjCod,PrjNam,DtlAmt from pntfccz where actno='%s' and TxnDat='%s' and dtlsts='2'

Transaction.desc: 银行系统产生的国库专户达账信息文件

DynSentence.name: GetCnt
DynSentence.Sentence: select count(*) as TotCnt from pntfcgk where TxnDat='%s' and DtlSts='2'

DynSentence.name: GetTit
DynSentence.Sentence: select CityCd,ActNo,ActNam,ActBnk,sum(cast(dtlamt as bigint)) as TitAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TitNum from pntfcgk where TxnDat='%s' and DtlSts='2' group by CityCd,ActNo,ActNam,ActBnk

DynSentence.name: GetTot
DynSentence.Sentence: select BankCd,RcvAct,sum(cast(dtlamt as bigint)) as TotAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TotNum from Pntfcgk where TxnDat='%s' and DtlSts='2' group by BankCd,RcvAct

DynSentence.name: GetDat
DynSentence.Sentence: select SubCod,SubNam,PrjCod,PrjNam,DtlAmt from pntfcgk where actno='%s' and TxnDat='%s' and dtlsts='2'

Transaction.desc: 非税系统基础数据文件导入
非税系统信息打印

DynSentence.name: QryCnt
DynSentence.Sentence: select totnum from pntfcgk where dtlsts='2'

Case.Set: Summary=打印非税业务问题账务
RptHead=非税业务财政专户分成信息文件
Summary=打印非税业务财政专户分成信息
RptHead=非税业务国库分成信息文件
Summary=打印非税业务国库分成信息
RptHead=非税业务财政专户达账信息文件
Summary=打印非税业务财政专户达账信息
RptHead=非税业务国库达账信息文件
Summary=打印非税业务国库达账信息

If.Set: RspMsg=没有满足条件记录,取文件错误

Case.Set: RptHead=非税系统产生的汇总分成专户文件
Summary=打印非税系统产生的汇总分成信息
RptHead=银行系统产生专户汇总达账文件
Summary=打印非税业务专户汇总达账信息

Arg.name: Summary
Arg.value: 中山非税系统收款文件已发出

If.Set: RspMsg=报表已经生成发送到系统打印机上

Transaction.desc: 分解票据

DynSentence.name: QryPJCnt
DynSentence.Sentence: select count(*) as TBilCnt from pntpjff where TBilReSts='1'

DynSentence.name: QryPJTB
DynSentence.Sentence: select TBilTp,TBilStar,TBilEnd,TBilTot,TBilSts from pntpjff where TBilReSts='1'

DynSentence.name: InsertPJInf
DynSentence.Sentence: insert into PntPjNum (TBilTp,TBilNo,TBilSts,TBilFFSts,TBilNod) values ('%s','%s','1','1','POS')

DynSentence.name: UpdPJSts
DynSentence.Sentence: update PntPjff set TBilReSts='2' where TBilTp='%s' and TBilStar='%s' and TBilEnd='%s' and TBilTot='%s' and TBilSts='%s'

Transaction.desc: 非税系统产生的汇总分成专户文件
银行系统产生专户汇总达账文件

DynSentence.name: GetCnt
DynSentence.Sentence: select count(*) as TotCnt from PntHzfczh where TxnDat='%s' and DtlSts='2'

DynSentence.name: GetDat
DynSentence.Sentence: select TCrpCd,RevDat,PrjCod,TotAmt,ZHBankCd,TxnDat,ZHActNo,TCrpCd,PrjCod,ZCKM,JJCK from PntHzfczh where TxnDat='%s' and dtlsts='2'

Transaction.desc: 对账文件状态维护

DynSentence.name: GetFcczDts
DynSentence.Sentence: select DtlSts from PntFccz where TxnDat = '%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdFcczDts
DynSentence.Sentence: update PntFccz set DtlSts = '2' where TxnDat = '%s'

DynSentence.name: GetFcgkDts
DynSentence.Sentence: select DtlSts from PntFcgk where TxnDat = '%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdFcgkDts
DynSentence.Sentence: update PntFcgk set DtlSts = '2' where TxnDat = '%s'

DynSentence.name: GetHzfczhDts
DynSentence.Sentence: select DtlSts from PntHzfczh where TxnDat = '%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdHzfczhDts
DynSentence.Sentence: update PntHzfczh set DtlSts = '2',RevDat='%s' where TxnDat = '%s'

Transaction.desc: 柜面查询缴费
提取票据号码

DynSentence.name: Chk_PntJnl
DynSentence.Sentence: select * from pnttxnjnl where TVchId='%s' and TCrpCd='%s' and BilSts='B'

DynSentence.name: QryPJNumNod1
DynSentence.Sentence: select distinct TBilNo from pntpjnum where TBilTp='%s' and TBilNod='999' and TBilSts='1'

DynSentence.name: UpdPJNumNod4
DynSentence.Sentence: update pntpjnum set TBilSts='4' where TBilTp='%s' and TBilNo='%s' and TBilNod='999'

If.Set: RspMsg=该通知书银行已扣款状态，请查证!
RspMsg=支行未分配票据号码或无票据类型

Transaction.desc: 柜面到第三方缴费

DynSentence.name: UpdJnlTHDS
DynSentence.Sentence: update pnttxnjnl set TTxnSt='S' where BankCd='%s' and TVchId='%s' and TCrpCd='%s' and ActDat='%s' and HTxnSt='S' and BilSts='B'

Transaction.desc: 柜面不需要手工录入缴费记主机帐务

DynSentence.name: Chk_CrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select a.BrNo,a.BBusTyp,a.TActNo,a.CrpCod,a.TxnDir,b.StlAct from savcrpagr a, savcrpinf b where a.CAgtNo='%s' and SvrSts='1' and b.CrpCod=a.CrpCod and a.brno=b.brno

DynSentence.name: UpdTxnJnlS
DynSentence.Sentence: update pnttxnjnl set HTxnSt='S',BilSts='B' where BankCd='%s' and TVchId='%s' and TCrpCd='%s' and ActDat='%s' and HTxnSt='U' and logno='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdPJNumNod2
DynSentence.Sentence: update pntpjnum set TBilSts='2' where TBilTp='%s' and TBilNo='%s' and TBilNod='999' and TBilSts='4'

Transaction.desc: 柜面不需要手工录入缴费确认

DynSentence.name: UpdJnlStsS
DynSentence.Sentence: update pnttxnjnl set TxnSts='S',PayDat='%s' where BankCd='%s' and TVchId='%s' and TCrpCd='%s' and ActDat='%s' and HTxnSt='S' and TTxnSt='S' and BilSts='B'

Transaction.desc: 生成校验码
柜面录入缴费不记主机帐务

DynSentence.name: Chk_CrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select a.BrNo,a.BBusTyp,a.TActNo,a.CrpCod,a.TxnDir,b.StlAct from savcrpagr a, savcrpinf b where a.CAgtNo='%s' and SvrSts='1' and b.CrpCod=a.CrpCod and a.brno=b.brno

DynSentence.name: UpdTxnJnlS
DynSentence.Sentence: update pnttxnjnl set HTxnSt='S',BilSts='B' where BankCd='%s' and TVchId='%s' and TCrpCd='%s' and ActDat='%s' and HTxnSt='U' and LogNo='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdPJNumNod2
DynSentence.Sentence: update pntpjnum set TBilSts='2' where TBilTp='%s' and TBilNo='%s' and TBilNod='999' and TBilSts='4'

If.Set: RspMsg=该交易只允许营业部操作

Transaction.desc: 银行系统产生的柜面收款信息文件

DynSentence.name: GetChkDtl
DynSentence.Sentence: select TCrpCd,TVchId,TBilTp,TBilNo,TxnAmt from PntTxnJnl where ActDat='%s' and BilSts='B'

DynSentence.name: GetTot
DynSentence.Sentence: select sum(cast(txnamt as bigint)) as TotAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TotNum from PntTxnJnl where ActDat='%s' and BilSts='B'
